This is a one, two, or three letter code identifying the species used for site index. To populate this field, will need to match the NFI variables for 'site_index_genus' and 'site_index_species' to the the SPECIES column within the 'lookup_species' function located at: (https://github.com/bcgov/FAIBCompiler/blob/master/R/lookup_species.R)
